pages.text:
Unboxers are special machines which unpack item from boxes.
Boxes can be inserted from any side, and the extracted items can be extracted from any side as well.
A box will be locked in the Unboxer until it is fully emptied, at which point, extraction will be allowed.

• Uses energy: $(scfg/boxing.useEnergy)
• Energy Capacity: $(scfg/boxing.energyCapacity)
• Energy I/O rate: $(antsportation_boxing_io) FE / t
• Ticks per operation: $(scfg/boxing.baseNeededTicks)
• Base energy usage: $(scfg/boxing.baseUsedEnergy) FE / t
pages.title: Stats
